about_the_game:
It's time to get ready for the Legends & Sports!



Complete your collection and show off your style!
This pack of ten characters can be used in either single-player or multiplayer modes.

Pack includes:
047. Sally the Witch
051. Y89 the unknown Alien Robot
067. Stamp the feared Pirate
110. Puss the sexy female Spy
113. Muffin the Cheerleader
018. Duty the Knight of Honour
211. Snowy the Snowboarder
177. Butch the Jock
130. James the charming Male Spy
141. Flex the sporty female knight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX / AMD R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Legends & Sports character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
